QuestData.Title: Getting the Message
QuestData.Description:
Da loa be powerful, but we be needin' soldiers if we gonna have a chance of stopping dem blood trolls from building dat giant of theirs. If we not be able ta destroy dat thing before it be finished, den Zuldazar and all of our people gonna be dead!
We need da help of da Horde!
Word of da situation already be sent to da warchief. As soon as we be hearin' her reply, we can mov--
Wait... what be dat noise?
